warnings.title: Welcome to Vanta Launcher
warnings.message: This is the beta version of Vanta Launcher! Thank you for testing.

globalNews.title: Vanta Launcher Released!
globalNews.summary: The official release of Vanta Launcher is here. Download and manage your Fortnite builds with ease!

availableBackends.name: Lawin Server
availableBackends.description: LawinServerV1 is a local, single-user Fortnite backend (server emulator) which supports both Battle Royale and Save the World.
availableBackends.author: Lawin0129

availableBackends.name: Lawin Server V2
availableBackends.description: LawinServerV2 is a Fortnite backend (server emulator) designed to handle many users. It features a proper account system and XMPP support.
availableBackends.author: Lawin0129

availableBackends.name: Neonite V2
availableBackends.description: Neonite V2 - An open-source Fortnite lobby emulator, written in JavaScript.
availableBackends.author: Kemo

availableBackends.name: Neodyme
availableBackends.description: Neodyme is a powerful and fully featured Fortnite backend written in Node.js, supporting authentication, MCP, matchmaking, XMPP, friends system, events, custom plugins, Shop, and much more... built for self-hosting and full customization.
availableBackends.author: Aorux

availableBackends.name: Aura
availableBackends.description: Aura Backend - A feature-enhanced Fortnite backend fork of the Momentum Fortnite backend.
availableBackends.author: alxan-balao

availableBackends.name: Arcane V5
availableBackends.description: A Universal Backend For Old Builds Of Fortnite, This Is The Last One! Aiming To Be 1:1!
availableBackends.author: PongooDev

availableBackends.name: Reload
availableBackends.description: Created by Burlone, This is a modded backend, all main backend credits to Lawin
availableBackends.author: Burlone0 and Heliato

availableBackends.name: Momentum
availableBackends.description: An improved version of Lawin Server in regards of production usage
availableBackends.author: Simplyzetax

availableBackends.name: TTY Backend
availableBackends.description: LawinServer V2 with some extra features API / STATUS BOT and more
availableBackends.author: SkyAlumny
